entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
